verbose_text: Likewise, overexpression of a constitutively active form of Arf6 (Arf6 / Q67L), which induces the formation of PI (4,5) P 2 -enriched endosomal structures led to retargeting of Gag to these vesicles and severely reduced virus production.
evidence: Arf6 (Arf6/Q67L), which induces the formation of PI
